SENT.plain: The authors describe a 5-year-old Caucasian girl, referred to their hospital for evaluation of an unconjugated hyperbilirubinemia (57.9 micromol/L) detected from blood analysis during an episode of fever
The molecular analysis of the TATA-box region of the UGT1A1 gene revealed that the patient was a compound heterozygote for two insertions, one TA and the other TATA [(TA)(7)/(TA)(8)]
This is the first case of (TA)8 allele found in a Portuguese Caucasian patient and the third found in the literature
